title: SSU Spirituality Week, Presents: Meditation For Resilience
description: Rise Above Yoga offers yoga and spiritual support in person and virtually.
cleaned_text: Date : Sep 22, 2020 , 2:00pm - 3:00pm Location : Zoom Event Categories : Sponsor : Student Involvement Admission Fees : FREE Contact Email : Rise Above Yoga offers yoga and spiritual support in person and virtually. Maddie is a trauma recovery coach and educator who empowers her community in their healing journey by holding space for the emotions that we tend to bury within ourselves. For more information, [maddiemmackey@gmail.com](mailto:maddiemmackey@gmail.com) [Forward to Friends](mailto:?subject=SSU Spirituality Week, Presents: Meditation For Resilience&body=https://www.sonoma.edu/calendar/ssu-spirituality-week-presents-meditation-resilience) Date : September 22, 2020 Add to Calendar
